SELECT currval('t_trade_deal_id_seq')
insert into t_trade_deal (tradeOrderId, positionId, accountId, stockId, stockMarket, execVolume, execPrice, execTime, direction, profit, commission, taxes, status ) values (#{tradeOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockMarket,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{execVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{execPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{execTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{direction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{profit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{taxes,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
